about_the_game:
Snowy Mountain features endless procedurally generated and customizable 3D Physics terrain, over 100 challenges and a wide variety of skins and gear to unlock. Upgrade your skills and reach new heights in the infinite low-poly world, with every play experience being unique and personalized. Join the adventure now and experience endless fun and thrill with Snowy Mountain on Steam.

Endless 3D Physics Terrain - Procedurally Generated and Customizable

The game offers endless terrain that is procedurally generated, meaning that no two play sessions will be the same. Additionally, the terrain is customizable, allowing players to adjust various parameters such as the number of mountains, trees, and buildings, to create the perfect terrain for their playstyle. The weather is also randomized and customizable

A Wide Variety of Skins - Unlock and Customize

The game also offers a wide variety of skins to unlock. These skins can combined and customized to personalize the appearance of the player's character and make it unique. The skins can be unlocked by collecting coins or by purchasing them in the in-game store.


100+ Challenges - Test Your Skills and Reflexes

Another great feature of Snowy Mountain is the variety of challenges on offer. With over 100 challenges to conquer, players will be kept on their toes as they try to complete each one, unlocking more and more terrain objects. The challenges are designed to test players' skills, speed, and reflexes, and will keep you coming back for more.

Upgradable Skills - Reach New Heights

Snowy Mountain allows players to upgrade their skills, enabling them to go faster and higher than ever before. This adds an extra layer of excitement and challenge to the gameplay, and allows players to personalize their experience. It can be used to customize your play experience to your liking and increasing skill level over time, and to help you complete challenges by tweaking it to optimize


3D Low-poly - Immersive Gameplay

The game is developed with 3D low-poly graphics and realistic physics which creates an immersive gameplay, where the player will feel like they are in the game, not just playing it.




Snowy Mountain is the ultimate destination for winter sports enthusiasts! Whether you prefer the thrill of snowboarding, the elegance of skiing, the excitement of snowscootering, or the adrenaline-fueled rush of (winter-) sports and games, this 3D physics game has something for everyone.



Snowy Mountain offers an unique gaming experience that will keep you coming back for more. So why wait? Download Snowy Mountain today and immerse yourself in a stunning virtual world and experience the thrill of navigating through challenging courses and obstacles !
